physical_appearance: This is a white under blouse. The blouse buttons down the front. It has short sleeves and a v-neck. The fabric features a light repeated floral pattern. There are two pockets in the front near the bottom hem. The blouse is slightly crumpled along the folds.
sgcool_label_text: This loose-fitting cotton camisole with a woven floral design belonged to a majie, a Cantonese female domestic helper. It was worn under the samfoo, their traditional attire which consists of a white mandarin-collar top and black trousers.
subject_terms_2: Ethnic costume Household employees Motifs Underwear
